Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context

The context in which a template is being processed and a default implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Context
    A context that is used throughout the processing of one template.
    ContextEnricher
    Enriches the context when a template is being processed.
    Scope
    A variable scope in a Context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractContext
    Convenience superclass for classes that would like to implement Context.
    DefaultContext
    The default context.
    DefaultScope
    The default, map-backed, scope implementation.
    ScopeMap
    A map that contains variables in a certain scope.

Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context Description

The context in which a template is being processed and a default implementation. To find out more about contexts, please see the wiki.
